tool.name: Perform a Shannon test
tool.description: It performs a Shannon test using a BIOM file as input
tool.help:
**About**
This tool performs the Shannon test on a matrix, as part of the mPuma pipeline.
**Usage**
The input is a BIOM file (http://biom-format.org/).
**Contact**
Please use the GitHub issues facility for bugs/enhancements/technical questions (https://github.com/mikel-egana-aranguren/mPuma-Galaxy), and mikel.egana.aranguren@gmail.com for any other comments.
